TEXT.TITLE: SPEED-O-PRINT BUSINESS <SBM> 4TH QTR NET
TEXT.BODY: Shr loss seven cts vs profit 17 cts Net loss 102,000 vs profit 258,000 Revs 1,695,000 vs 1,371,000 Year Shr loss 33 cts vs profit 26 cts Net loss 488,000 vs profit 384,000 Revs 6,700,000 vs 4,774,000 NOTE: 1986 results include operations of radio stations WJYE-FM for the full year and WNNR-AM for the last six months. Speed-O-Print Business Machines Corp is full name of company. Reuter
